logging:
  level:
    root: INFO
    com.example: DEBUG
  file:
    name: app.log
    max-size: 10MB
    max-history: 30

spring:
  datasource:
    url: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb
    username: ${DB_USERNAME}
    password: ${DB_PASSWORD}
  jpa:
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: validate
    show-sql: false

server:
  port: 8080
  compression:
    enabled: true
